name: @polylink/root
description: Polylink is an AI-powered web application that helps students find classes, clubs, events, professors, and more. We are a team of students with the misison to make the college experience easier and more enjoyable.

scripts.install:all: npm run install:client && npm run install:server && npm run install:shared
scripts.build:all: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:shared
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:shared"
scripts.format: npm run format:client && npm run format:server && npm run format:shared
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server

author: Cristian Castro Oliva
